summary: Installed, when I try to run it it says:

description: The installer didn't add the app to the list of installed applications. I had to hunt for it and accidentally found it. When I started it, it ask for my weight in kilograms and my height in kilograms? No way to change the units. This looks like something some who just learned to program wrote as a test and then posted it. Keep trying. Maybe you'll get there.
Mass is kg is ok, the height appears to be in cm. With these corrections the calulated value is higher that expected (chech your algebra). Good work for a first coding, don't give up.
